title: Logitech Orion Spark

embed.description: G910 Orion Spark gaming keyboard, with intelligent RGB illumination, is the fastest mechanical gaming keyboard. Learn more.

body:
anyone have any idea how to get the orion spark to pick up or recognize League of Legends for the Lighting change profile. 
OR: by chance the file name to recognize and pick up the game

replies.body: Most mechanical keyboard brand with chromas usually require a software to perform different light patterns or functions.  You may need to look deeper at their site to see if you need to download that, and see if their [support ](http://support.logitech.com/en_us/product/rgb-gaming-keyboard-g910#community)has any details for your specifications.  Good luck!
